# Work Experience

```{r workExperience}
workExperience %>%
  detailed_entries(
    what = company,
    when = glue::glue('{startDate} - {endDate}'),
    with = title,
    where = location,
    why = points)
```

# Education

```{r}
education %>%
  detailed_entries(
    what = institution,
    when = glue::glue('{startDate} - {endDate}'),
    with = degree,
    where = location,
    why = points)
```
